{{expansion}} {{adaptation}} {{infobox character | people=[[Orcs|Orc]] | name=Gorkil | image=Gorkil.jpg | caption="Gorkil" from ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'' | pronun= | othernames= | titles=Goblin King | position= | location=[[Ettenmoors]] | affiliation=[[Orcs of the Misty Mountains|Goblins]] | language=[[Black Speech]]
[[Westron]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes=Pale yellow | clothing= | weapons= | steed=Large scorpion }} The '''Gorkil''', also known as the '''Goblin King''', was a hero within the "[[Orcs of the Misty Mountains|Goblins]]" faction. Gorkil was invented by [[Electronic Arts]] for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'', where he was voiced by [[Dave Wittenberg]]. == History == Gorkil was a puppet ruler used by [[Sauron]] to hold sway over the disparate tribes and unions among the [[Orcs of the Misty Mountains|Orcs of the Mountains]]. From his stronghold in the [[Ettenmoors]], the Goblin King threatened the [[Free peoples|Free Peoples]] of the [[Eriador|North]] and gathered a great following. After a skirmish at his fortress, the forces of [[Glóin]] and [[Glorfindel]] put an end to the Goblin King's reign, and the Orc host was dispersed. == Spells == * Skull Totem - Places a skull totem which will remain on the map until *destroyed. Reveals the nearby shroud and detects stealth. * Mount/Dismount - Mount and unmount Gorkil's scorpion. * Battle Frenzy - Targeted units gain +50% Damage, +50% Armor, and earn experience twice as fast. * Poisoned Stinger - Targeted enemy becomes stunned and takes poison damage over time. * Call from the Deep - Summons three Fire Drakes under the caster's control. {{References}} [[Category:Orcs from adaptations]] [[Category:The Battle for Middle-earth (video game series) characters]]
